messages.message: Hi all, just wanted to share that I’ve created a new Engineering Confluence space (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/overview) to host documentation, best practices, guides, videos and other helpful links that are common across all eng teams. This should ideally be the go-to source-of-truth for everyone to have access to our engineering practices. I’ve started consolidating links I’ve found scattered across a number of different places. If anyone knows of an existing or better place this information should be hosted, please let me know and I’ll be happy to move!
